title: Victory: The Reagan Administration's Secret Strategy That Hastened the Collapse of the Soviet Union
description: Victory tells the story of a secret U.S. strategy developed in the Reagan White House in early 1982 that hastened the demise of the Soviet Union. In this explosive book, Peter Schweizer provides the riveting details of how the Reagan administration undermined the Soviet economy and its dwindling resource base while subverting the Kremlinâ€™s hold on its global empire.
author: Peter Schweizer
